website_summaries.verdict: Non-adhesive, wet application privacy film that is ideal for application in the  bathroom or on street facing windows. Easy to peel off and reapply.
pros: This thick privacy material also aids in temperature conservation
helps insulate in the summer and preserve heat in the winter
cons: A handful of users had trouble smoothing out bubbles during application

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: So a whole ago I purchased this product, I am not sure why it didn’t work it could have been a defective Roll at that time I wrote a negative review about the product and the owners sent me another roll for free. It took a long time before I decided to try it again, I am so glad I did the film did work extremely well this time once I applied I could really tell the difference from the first time we used it. Works excellent, I am sorry for my first bad review. Totally worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple. Cut it a tad bigger than your measurements.
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly watched three or four videos of how to install ahead of time. Was probably a waste of time as it was incredibly easy to install. I’d cut it 1/4 inch bigger than measurement. What’s great is that you can’t screw up when hanging it on the window. It’s just water so you could redo it 20 times and it’d be fine. Make sure you don’t cut it too small though. That’s about the only way to screw it up. Just cut it a little big and use a razor and a putty knife to cut it perfectly. I just got done with the transom in the picture shown.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Vander Ploeg

customer_reviews.title: Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Single woman in a new home. & I needed to blur tint the windows because blinds are disgusting! The blur tint was one of the easiest things to install! Not sure if the (water & soap) application was needed. (Second photo) Left a few spots not a big deal. All I used was a old shopping card and a razor to cut the fine lines on the end of the window. If you are doing this by yourself start from the top of the window and work your way down!
customer_reviews.author: DDUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my windows above my porch doors and they came out great. They provide a nice even light to come in and also keeps the temp down when the sun is shining. Very easy to install and it is a high quality product. I recommend you use soapy water in a spray bottle for the best results! Sprayed on liberally without making a puddle. I used an old credit card to smooth out bubbles and a sharp box cutter knife to trim any edges. It came out great and people don't believe me when I said I installed it, looks professional!
customer_reviews.author: Papayaman

customer_reviews.title: Looks real
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and it provides the perfect coverage while still allow lights in, which is very important to me. Definitely do exactly as the instruction says. It's the best way to do it. Any other ways (which I tried) wouldn't provide good results. Another note is while this product is cheap, pay attention to the square footage and how much it would cover. There wasn't a lot of it in the package. I would say one roll covers about one average-sized full-glass door.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy catsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.text: We have tiny windows in our basement that we weren’t sure what to do with. Our house was built in the 50s and they have odd sizes and angles on every window frame. We decided to give this a try to help give us privacy without losing light. We are super pleased with this window film. It looks good and doesn’t take much effort to install. I do recommend cutting the pieces slightly larger than you window and using a razor to trim after you have it in place. Easily the best $ we have spent to give us some privacy in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseca

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install and the best price offering.
customer_reviews.text: So after reading about a bunch of these and seeing largely the same “ complaints” I opted for the best priced one. I am completely happy with the purchase and would highly recommend. The installation for me was easy. Went on without issue the first time. I simply followed the video instructions which are clear and straightforward. I even cut out sections freehand to give it more visual interest using a simple razor blade. Not a single hitch! It’s just the privacy I sought, very inexpensive and seems like it’s on for good. Time will tell but it seems like a very good product at an amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Romeyd

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little more privacy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for our front door, for a little added privacy. It's still opaque enough that you can see shapes and movement, but the frosted texture definitely provides more privacy. It took a while for us to measure and cut to the exact size needed, but otherwise installation was quick & easy! We used a wet washcloth to add moisture to the window before adhering. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jason humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Privacy at the Front Door
customer_reviews.text: This frosted non adhesive privacy film installed very easily, and it looks great! We have 2 long windows framing our front door, and we wanted to add the film so that our dogs don’t bark by everyone walking down the street. Applying the film literally took 20 minutes. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but has bubbles I can't get rid of
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part was cutting this so it had straight edges. I followed the installation instructions and it worked great for a few days. However after about a week, it got some large bubbles that I can't get rid of. It's only noticeable if you look directly at it and luckily it's a high up window so people don't usually look at it. It's staying on but the bubble are very obvious. Unfortunately this seems to be the best option for making that window easily look frosted.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff !
customer_reviews.text: We have very tall double doors in our living with a lot of glass which allows people to peek in while driving/walking by. Using this film corrected that! To make sure each piece of film fit each leaded section, I used pieces of parchment paper and a sharpie to outline each section where I wanted the film. I then turned the paper over, laid the film on top with backing facing up, traced the shape onto the back of the film, then cut it out. Perfect fit for each piece! I couldn’t get all the air bubbles out, but I’m ok with that. Looks great and we now have more privacy!
customer_reviews.author: Old New Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product, blocks a lot of sun
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty cool, it lets a lot of light through, but blocks the sun and should keep the room cooler. In the photo I put a small square on the window and you can see how it is creating a solid shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were easy to follow and right on
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much, easy to install. Putin bottom half of bathroom window for privacy. Have blind there also, but wanted to open blind, but needed privacy . This lets a lot of light in, but can see in.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Great for privacy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to keep my wood blinds up some due to my cats. I ran this along the bottom portion of the window for privacy. (I live in a condo) Now the cats are not making noise going in and out of the blinds and I still have my privacy. I turned on the lights at night and looked in from the outside and you can't see anything (as long as it is cut to fit). I personally found it easier to measure, mark and cut with scissors than to use the razor blade. Super easy to install and is thick so it does not tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my classroom/office doorway to enhance privacy. The end result was so nice that a colleague asked me to use it on theirs as well. It is easy to use so long as you follow the directions (use more water than you think you need). I found it was easy to position, remove and re-apply as needed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gaillard

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, functional, happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Really not difficult to put on at all. It is a little challenging to pre-cut or cut later the edges (either way) if you are going for perfection. Maybe have a few air bubbles in the 4 or 5 windows that I did (need a few rolls to do this many windows so pricey but worth it). But overall, very satisfied and provides EXCELLENT block/blur of visibility through the windows (comfortable standing naked in my bathroom at any time of day with neighbors right outside).
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Forgiving
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised by how well it turned out. I’m usually terrible with things like this, but the material is very forgiving. I was a little concerned as soon as it went on, but the next day it looked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leeder

customer_reviews.title: it really does work!
customer_reviews.text: purchased this because our apartment hasnt replaced the broken blinds in our master bedroom window. it really tints the window and very easy to use, took about 10 minutes for 3 windows. i bought 2 more to add to our children's windows.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, easy to use, went on without any problems, easy to cut with a sharp razor.
customer_reviews.author: shellshell

customer_reviews.title: It sticks great and covers very nicely
customer_reviews.text: I am just really happy I bought this product for my shower window.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest privacy solution for side light windows and in very happy with the results. The hardest part is measuring and cutting the right size. It would be better if it had grid lines on back for easy cutting but I managed to get a decent cut anyways. Installation was a breeze. I sprayed the window down a lot and the water is key. Proves privacy, can’t see In or out. Allows light in but I wanted that for my plants.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Manley

customer_reviews.title: Get the regular, not the white
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get the white version, it looks cheapish. The regular frosted version works great and blocks objects without blocking light itself
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to block visibility into my sidelight window from the outside. It does allow sunlight in but you can't see anything else. Installation was very easy - clean window, measure, cut to size, wet window and apply. I installed it about 2 weeks ago - still looks great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Al Wendt

customer_reviews.title: No curtain needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to install and I'm impressed with the privacy that it provides.
customer_reviews.author: QTMyles

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to remove the clear film/backing before applying.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a first floor apartment and this is perfect for my privacy. I covered half of the window so when I'm sitting in my livingroom nobody can creep on me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Added privacy/security to some shed windows as well as a basement door and windows. Very easy to install. Products clings very well and looks like frosted glass. Since it’s “attached” with static/water, it’s easy tfor remove or do over. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Alli O.

customer_reviews.title: Privacy goal achieved. :-)
customer_reviews.text: I like it! My first try at applying something like this. My bathroom doors had some stained glass looking design which made it look extremely dated plus it didn't do much for privacy. This really served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to my problem
customer_reviews.text: This window used to look out on a neighbor's junky driveway, directly into their ever-open garage which was filled with clutter. Like I wanna see that when I'm working at the sink! Eventually I put a white trash bag up in the window until I could come up with a better solution. Then I bought this film and got a handyman to apply it. It looks FABULOUS. The light is beautiful and makes the room feel clean and bright. Great solution to my problem!
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product truly exceeded my expectations! I used it on both my entertainment cabinets that had clear glass. It never looked neat and clean so I thought this would be a good solution. It really looks amazing and was easy to do. The hardest part was measuring accurately and peeling the backing off. It was very easy to move around if it wasn’t centered. Best advice would be to make sure the glass is clean and well saturated with water. I love this product and the new look of my entertainment areas!
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't spray.Use this!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the spray frost. Uneven and blotchy. This product is perfect. The video shows work in progress. Did not have any of the install problems a few purchasers have described. Just cut 2 edges longer and wider, sprayed water, fit the edges, squeegeed, trimmed and let it dry. Used an exacto style knife with new blade. Needed to buy a second roll of the same size to complete the 10 10x12 squares on french door. Highly recommend.!
customer_reviews.author: c glomstad

customer_reviews.title: Don't use water when installing, even though it's instructed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one roll for each window. I had left over but not enough for a whole window, so ended up needing to use both rolls. One window I followed the instructions and sprayed water into the window. The other window I did not use water. I wish I hadn't used water on the first one because you can see the water spots on the film, even after it dried. I took it off, reapplied but you can still see water spots. The important part is my neighbors can't see directly into their house but I wish it turned out better.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed for my bathroom window where I plan to hang a stained glass mosaic.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter54

customer_reviews.title: Easy and  inexpensive  solution that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and looks great. My 2 great Pyrenees dogs finally broke through our front window. Every sound or passerby had them lunging at the glass from our window seat. We had to do something to protect them. This was an inexpensive solution that looks great and so far is working to keep them calm.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It is super durable easy to use and install, I was concerned it'd be to thin and cheap but nope it thick enough it didn’t try to fold onto itself! I wouldn’t hesitate to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: I get natural light and privacy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to position and apply. The key is to have a little sticking off the sides and precision cut with a blade. I still get natural light without having to have the curtains closed during the day for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A Hildebran

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use on my bathroom window and couldn't be more pleased with the results. No need to have 2 people to put this up, as it is quite easy to do by yourself. Yes, spritz the window a lot for easy installation. The air bubbles were quickly removed with a plastic squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COVERS THE WINDOWNS
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because it covers the windows on the front door especially for privacy. Putting it on was a bit stressful because I kept getting air bubbles I used a credit card and tried my very best to get the air pockets out, but no luck I still got a bunch of bubbles not the fault of the product because it is a good product - I just wasn't the best an adhering it to the window. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: tunwewec

customer_reviews.title: Good quality frosted material
customer_reviews.text: Good quality frosted material, easy to install using water, gives a good quality look, great privacy and great price. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: barnabusdonn

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective! Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for two reasons: block glare from car windshields in parking lot and reduce distractions from moving people and vehicles. This window film does both! I added 6-9” along the bottom of my office window. One of the windows if 64” wide; it was easy to install. I did not have a spray bottle so I used a wet sponge. I had to reset part of it two times to get it straight, it lifted and reset very easily. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Privacy with natural light
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Cut to size and peel backing off. Once backing separates it is easily moved into place on window. Good compromise between privacy and light.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Building house next door. Still want my sunlight & privacy - this works really well. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: californiabelle

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a quick solution for privacy.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the spray window frosting in the past with success. I decided to try this product to avoid masking and all the other prep that goes along with spray paint. This product is okay. Make sure and have the glass very wet before applying. The finished look is okay for providing privacy but it does have bubbles here and there which showed up the day after installation. I am wondering if it will start coming apart from the glass. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Sujan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not nearly enough
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but fairly limited amount. Was only able to cover half of two windows and when you try and place seems together it is very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Z Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Durable & quality product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and provides 100% privacy. Easy to take on & off, worth the $. I move it constantly and it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Static film
customer_reviews.text: Wow this film turns any glass into obscure glass in a second. It took me 15 mins to install (10 mins measure and cut, 5 mins to put it on glass and eliminate all the bubbles). Having water is the key to have a no air bubble installation. Unlike adhesive, you can easily adjust installation at any time, so you don’t need to worry about getting it perfect the first time. The only thing is, after a few days, bubbles started to appear on the edges, which is not visible from a distance and can be fixed easily. Good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: East to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This film works great! I have a small window in my bathroom that I needed to cover and this film went up beautifully and has stayed in place. I love this stuff! It still lets some light in but thankfully, blocks out people's view
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Kinda thick, hard to get corners down,
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says, it is a thick , very white plastic. It not want to stick down in corners very well, it finally did . I ha e used window tint before, which was easier to installed.
customer_reviews.author: jack swanson

customer_reviews.title: would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: love this, works great to block siggt inyo my house and prevent my dogs from going crazy seeing people. doesnt leave anything on Windows which is great because we're renting
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Privacy in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage yet the sunlight shines in. It gives my bathroom an airiness feel to an otherwise small space bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: KatherineMcCon

customer_reviews.title: Not too difficult to install; good privacy
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this product. I have side windows that face my neighbors windows - so I was looking for a way to add some privacy without blocking light. Neighbors can't see in/I can't see out! They were also way easier to install than some other brands I've used. I wiped window with a wet sponge to get it wet, smoothed the film over window, got bubbles out w a credit card, then used a box cutter along the edges to cut off the excess film. Took me about 20 minutes for a pretty large window and another 20 for 4 smaller windows.
customer_reviews.author: Beccy

customer_reviews.title: Window cling so it comes on and off easily without residue.
customer_reviews.text: We used a similar product before so we knew this would be an easy install. What makes this one different is that it’s truly frosted and even when up against it you cannot see through it. It does allow light through so it’s not a black out cling. It adheres well but sizing it is a pain. A box cutter tried to smoothly cut through but you have to go slow or it catches the frosting and snags. But this is far easier than the film and I won’t dock it for that. It technically is a one person job but two make it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Angel  P St.Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this window film providing enough privacy for use on my bathroom window. It's an old house, and the window dimensions made it difficult to find a curtain to fit, so this was the perfect solution. Very easy to install, and opaque enough to provide total privacy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I love how they turned out, but I need to order more to finish covering my door and the windows on the side. It was easy to cut and apply. I used a squeegee to remove the small bubbles. Now, my dog doesn’t bark every time someone walks down the street. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Easy, good quality product for privacy
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to curtains in order to have privacy. Straightforward to install, though 2 people might be easier because of all the static cling. But the bubbles scrape out easily and you can shift it around until it's in the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Elinneb

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Privacy that allows light to come in
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to my bathroom windows and it worked perfectly. It gives complete privacy without blocking the sunlight from getting in. I prefer it better than the blinds I had before with made the room much darker. The frosted film was super easy to apply to the window, (I had some trouble cutting it properly so that it would be the same size as the window but that was me not the product). Sunlight still comes in but gives complete privacy! I definitely recommend this product and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. Instructions are very simple but it is a little difficult to place without any bubbles especially in corners. Other than that it provides great privacy!
customer_reviews.author: Leillyan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it’s exactly what I needed. My is on the ground floor and has a big window that looks out towards the sidewalk. I wanted to have sunlight coming in but also wanted some privacy. The window film does exactly that. It was easy to install (I wiped down the glass with some wet wipes, then sprayed a generous coating of water to adhere the film). I was done in less than 30 minutes. The film is easy to remove; it’s basically a giant window decal. You can peel it right off if you don’t want it or need to adjust the positioning
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide privacy
customer_reviews.text: I purchase both colors (pure and white) and by far the white allows for more privacy. I need this for the window in the shower so it was very important to put something on the window that will protect everyone's privacy while in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: pdg

customer_reviews.title: Overall Does its Job but Not Adhesive Backed as Hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Overall for the price it does the job pretty well. But I was hoping for an adhesive backed film like window tint. This is just a wet and apply film that works ok. We're using it in our bathroom and the edges are already starting to bubble a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Clings well
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl sticks nicely. You just need to make sure to get it on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L.

customer_reviews.title: For our use the film is perfect. Placed on lower windows only for privacy in ...
customer_reviews.text: For our use the film is perfect. Placed on lower windows only for privacy in our home. One cannot see through yet light will still penetrate. Follow directions exactly and there will be no problems. Take your time. Does not look cheap. Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Java Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a temporary solution while we had to wait three weeks for an installer to be available to put permanent window coverings in our new condo. It did exactly what we needed and actually looked surprisingly good. Good enough that even after we got our window coverings, I left the film on so that we could open the coverings to let sunlight in while maintaining our privacy. More recently I had window tint professionally installed to cut down on heat transmission. The frosted film was easy to remove and then I reinstalled it when the tint job was finished.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: To the small percentage of reviewers who had issues.... I don't get it... it must be user error. I bought this one because it was the least expensive, so if it tanked, no worries. But! It is great. I followed the directions, but used a cheap plastic trowel instead of a "credit card"(?) to smooth out the bubbles. It is perfect. It truly blocks out intrusive viewers, while sacrificing very little in the way of light. And it looks great! I wish I had purchased a wider role to cover larger areas, but that's my problem ;) I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: Piece of cake to install and adheres perfectly to my entrance door window. I cleaned the window first with Windex then sprayed a generous amount of water on the glass before applying the frosted film. To finish, I used a sharp razor blade to trim the excess and voila it was done! I included two pictures: the first, (the white side of the door) is what it looks like from the inside. The second picture (the blue door) is what it looks like from the outside. When standing outside looking in, you can't make out any details to the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Why spend money on frosted glass windows when you can make your own
customer_reviews.text: At $10 it was worth the gamble to try this product. It worked perfectly and was easy to install. There is enough left on the roll that I may use it on another window that looks out on the neighbors. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Redondo Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Privacy ✓
customer_reviews.text: This product gets the job done, gives you privacy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy film
customer_reviews.text: I used this for our bathroom windows. I'm a pretty handy person, install was easy. The hardest part was cutting them to the right size. The wet install makes it easy to slide into place. It's kind of like installing a screen protector for a phone but on a larger scale. Once installed, it still let's some light through with full privacy. No one can see in or out.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great product film is very solid frosted as in thick ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product film is very solid frosted as in thick frost effect and I advice about the spraying water is to do a lot water for the process be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Jou

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for what I needed to create privacy. Easy to apply and the price is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and privacy
customer_reviews.text: I put this up with my 13 yo in about 10-15 minute. Idk about hold but it was simple enough. Used an box cutter And soapy water spray bottle! Privacy!!! So plead with the look.....!!!! Excuse the mess during installation,xxx
customer_reviews.author: Stacey  sage Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The product was relatively easy to use. I recommend installing initially and then using a razorblade to cut around the edges of the window/film instead. My first attempt measuring with a rule and cutting with scissors was a waste so I had to throw away the first attempt and try again with razorblade. It seals on quick with water and looks great. Definitely can't see through it but still lets light in!
customer_reviews.author: Sambrgr

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom window
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 15 minutes to our bathroom window, 2 months ago. Adhering perfectly, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Garage Windows
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to give more privacy to the garage. It is easy to install on the garage windows. Used primarily to deter burglars so they are not able to see when there are cars or no cars in the garage. It does a great job blocking out what lurking eyes can see in the garage. Installed during the summer. The weather has changed to the cooler side and it still adheres to the glass surface.
customer_reviews.author: Freemason Alex

customer_reviews.title: Privacy now!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT! Used it on the bottom half of my bathroom windows, easy to install, I imagine it's also easy to remove. I ordered way to much, make sure you measure before hand.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic and was pretty easy to install. Make sure you moisten surface. I just used a really damp cloth instead of spray bottle. Take your time with getting bubbles out. That’s what makes it look good.
customer_reviews.author: meredith o

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly in our shower window
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install. I have a large window in our shower and needed to cover the bottom half. I purchased the frosted film which was easy to apply. I used a kitchen bench scraper to smooth out the bubbles and remove the water which you use to make it stick. The film has stayed in place perfectly, even with the hot steam from the shower. The frosted film continues to allow lots of light into the shower, however people can not see through the glass. I recommend reading the directions on the outside of the roll before proceeding to open the package.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Covers as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first try at using frosted window cling. This did exactly as I wanted, covers my sidelight at front door. You can't see out or in, yet it lets in the light during the day. I also used on my bathroom french door, perfect product. I may get one with a print for my front glass door. Great item and I had not problem with it adhering to glass. However, I am having problems cutting even with a brand new xacto knife.
customer_reviews.author: sewmoore

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: awesome just as everyone described lets light in and total privacy
customer_reviews.author: Yaaamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy film and also acting like a window tint
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product before, need to add more sections to a window. Really easy to install as long you follow the instructions
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it would be hard to install, instead I was pleasantly surprised by the great result. Works just as described, obscuring the view into my bathroom but letting light in. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kikka

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We actually got two different kinds of frosted films and this one works way better because of below reasons: 1) this film is less transparent - which is great for privacy. 2) easy to install - actually works easier than the film comes with a sticky side. 3) although there are still some bubbles but they are really hard to see unless you stand super close to the panel. Overall - A+ product!
customer_reviews.author: Malexxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Used this to diffuse light on a glass top surface of the sand art drawing light table. Some wrinkles near the edges (due to foil not being completely flat at the edges) could not be squeezed down. Didn't matter that much for my application since wooden frame was covering it anyway, but could have been an issue if it was on a window and if there wasn't excess foil that could be cut off. If I needed it for the window, I would be ordering bigger foil than the window glass itself, so that I can trim off potentially wavy edges.
customer_reviews.author: Oggie

customer_reviews.title: Works well if surface is prepared. May not look clean cut.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: Overall, this is a good product. It works better for large panes of glass rather than jealousie panes. The reason is that it becomes tedious to cut cleany. The plastic is essy to cut, but it needs a cutting tool to make straight lines. This product expands and contracts a little. Pros: 1) Consistent quality material. 2) Easy to apply. 3) Cuts easily. 4) Good frosted look. Cons: 1)Hard to cut straight. 2) Not easy to apply for certain applications. 3) Can expand and contract with heat/cold.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had my doubts about this product after reading some of the negative reviews but turns out it was absolutely a breeze to install. Sprayed lots of soapy water on the window, then applied the film and used a window squishy combined with a credit card to get rid of all air bubbles. Only have a few bubbles that I missed. But honestly I blame that on the fact that I did it in the evening time in the dark and not on the product. Otherwise a perfect result.
customer_reviews.author: Christoffer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on my window so I’m not 100% sure about the durability but it seems good so far. You get a lot in 1 roll.
customer_reviews.author: S. Obie

customer_reviews.title: Looks super pro, great product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! I was skeptical because of the price. Its definitely not a simple install (I had to perfectly measure, make a stencil, mark the material with pen, use a cutting board and exacto knife very meticulously, then try to place perfectly). Takes a little time and effort but looks great! Fyi there is no adhesive on this product. Fill a spray bottle w water and GO TO TOWN. Seriously, i soaked the 4 little windows and it still dried up when applying. All in all couldn’t be happier (hopefully it stays like that). Both side look great and diffuse human and object silhouettes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this film for my bedroom windows. Let’s in lots of lights while providing privacy. Super easy to install. Just measure where you’re planning on applying then cut the film to fit. Clean the windows and spray soapy water to help place and adjust the film. Used a credit card to push out all the air bubbles. Didn’t take much more than 30 minutes and that was mainly spent on measuring and cutting. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Privacy finally!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I feel like a finally have some privacy in my own house! Before and after pics posted.
customer_reviews.author: SunShine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Did all my living room windows. Super easy and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Got these to avoid a creepy neighbor. They work great! Even with a lot of light inside!! So happy. Used them for dinning, bathroom and my daughter’s room. Easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Biany

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The window film installed easily to frost the glass of an office door. I used a little plastic scraper that helped a ton to squeeze out the bubbles and act as a guide to an xacto knife to trim the edges to fit the glass pane. More than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm in the bathroom - had a window in the shower and needed to obscure the view.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part of installation was removing the protective film. I cut my pieces to actual window size instead of trimming after. This does not provide significant privacy at night.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be very difficult but turns out to be very easy from measuring to cutting to instal!
customer_reviews.author: J.  Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Privacy
customer_reviews.text: This does provide privacy as described. A little annoying to get to stay, but since applying, it hasn't come off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITS EASY!  Don’t overthink it!!
customer_reviews.text: So our security camera picked up a tweaker peeking in the leaded front glass door of our home the other day. I went out to assess the view she had and was discouraged by how much a person with unGodly intentions could see into my house! Well of course I turned to Amazon for ideas, reviews, insights and pricing. Two clicks and Kapow! The film arrived and the hubs and I quarrously put it up. Well it was worth all the bickering!! Install was easy (maybe just do yourself). Privacy ✅
customer_reviews.author: Oystergirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Cutting was tedious to get it exact, but not terrible. Adhesive sticks very well, but easy to remove if needed. Allows light in while still blocking vision.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Heinold

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is good and durable. I do recommend this product... just make sure you measure properly. Any spots that are not 100% secure (even if they look it) cause the product to fall while the water is running in shower
customer_reviews.author: Alexist2109

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install and is the perfect amount of privacy while still letting in some light. If you are considering buying this, I would recommend it! It's a great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade Your Privacy
customer_reviews.text: After moving into my new house one of the first things I noticed were open clear windows on both sides of our front door. This inexpensive film gave me the option of added privacy without any permanent changes. I can now enjoy midnight snacks in my underwear in peace. Tips: 1. Clean windows thoroughly before starting 2. Use a fresh new razor blade 3. Trim to a slightly larger size than needed, then trim to fit 4. Use lots of water and slide to fit
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart Jr.

product_meta.title: Coavas Window Film Non Adhesive Frosted Home Office Film Privacy Window Sticker Self Static Cling Vinly Glass Film for Bathroom Office Meeting Room Living Room (Matte White 17.7by78.7 Inch)
feature_bullets: Summer is Coming! Let Soft Lights in and Blocks 96% Harmful Uv Rays. Two Kinds of Privacy Level. Pure Frosted Window Film:★★★★ White Frosted Window Film: ★★★★★

Home Office Window Privacy Film -- PRIVACY PROTECTION-- At a distance of one meter foil glass, privacy ≥95%. Providing privacy design to let you enjoy your life easily and safely. Tips from Smart Customers: Use a Hair Dryer to Soften the Film Or Soak the Film in Warm Water Under Cold Weather.Scrape a few more times with a hard card to ensure the bubbles are COMPLETELY REMOVED.

Home Office Window Privacy Film -- GLARE CONTROL & UV REJECTION-- Heat insulation in the summer and heat preservation in the winter. Blocks moderate glares and 96% harmful UV rays, prevent fading furniture and allow soft light for you room.

Home Office Window Privacy Film --- REUSABLE & RECYCLED-- No adhesive, removable without any residue, super static cling, easy to apply and can be applied several times. Water is the only tool you will use, more water is better. Size: 45*200 cm ( 17.7*78.7 inch)

Home Office Window Privacy Film -- ECONOMICAL & WIDE APPLICATION-- No more heavy & troublesome curtains or blinds, simple decorations make the life easier and better. smooth and clean Glass Surfaces in the Bathroom, Balcony, Living Room, Bedroom, Bathroom, Office, hotel, etc. Frosted glass, cut glass and all of processed glass is not workable.

Home Office Window Privacy Film -- INSTALLATION TIPS-- Clean windows or glass; Measure, mark and cut the film; Wet the window, more water more better; Peel off the backing film; Squeeze out excess water and bubbles with scraper or hard card; Dry off your window with the rag. (Make sure the edge of the protective film and the glass surface have a 1cm gap. )if it is difficult to tear off the protective film, you can try to tape the two sides with duct tape and then peel off.
